Title: Relates to excise taxes on cigars and premium cigars
Summary: Provides that the tax on cigars and premium cigars shall be at the rate of seventy-five percent of the wholesale price or fifty cents, whichever is less, and is intended to be imposed only once upon the sale of any cigars or premium cigars; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to excise taxes on cigars and premium cigars
